languages.text: "Кого ты посмел назвать щенками, Пропащий?! Мы, в отличие от твоей немощной стаи, скоро пойдем в бой и свершим великие подвиги! А ты трусливо желаешь удрать от долга!"
"Who are you calling a pup, Everlost? Unlike your pathetic pack, we will soon go into battle and accomplish great deeds! But you, coward that you are, want to shirk your duty!"
languages.original_text: "Кого ты посмел назвать щенками, Пропащий?! Мы, в отличие от твоей немощной стаи, скоро пойдем в бой и свершим великие подвиги! А ты трусливо желаешь удрать от долга!"

traits.locale_text: "Who are you calling a pup, Everlost? Unlike your pathetic pack, we will soon go into battle and accomplish great deeds! But you, coward that you are, want to shirk your duty!"
"Who are you calling a pup, Everlost? Unlike your pathetic pack, we will soon go into battle and accomplish great deeds! But you, coward that you are, want to shirk your duty!"
"Who are you calling a pup, Everlost? Unlike your pathetic pack, we will soon go into battle and accomplish great deeds! But you, coward that you are, want to shirk your duty!"
"Who are you calling a pup, Everlost? Unlike your pathetic pack, we will soon go into battle and accomplish great deeds! But you, coward that you are, want to shirk your duty!"

languages.text: “你说谁是狗崽子，迷途之人？我们和你们可悲的狼群不一样，我们很快就要参加战斗，实现伟大的目标了！至于你，你却打算推卸责任，你这个懦夫！”
languages.original_text: "Who are you calling a pup, Everlost? Unlike your pathetic pack, we will soon go into battle and accomplish great deeds! But you, coward that you are, want to shirk your duty!"

traits.locale_text: “你说谁是狗崽子，迷途之人？我们和你们可悲的狼群不一样，我们很快就要参加战斗，实现伟大的目标了！至于你，你却打算推卸责任，你这个懦夫！”

languages.text: 「誰が子犬だって、エバーロスト？お前のかわいそうな群れと違って、俺たちはまもなく戦闘に入り、大きな手柄を残す！だがお前は、臆病者は、責任逃れをしたいんだろ！」
languages.original_text: "Who are you calling a pup, Everlost? Unlike your pathetic pack, we will soon go into battle and accomplish great deeds! But you, coward that you are, want to shirk your duty!"

traits.locale_text: 「誰が子犬だって、エバーロスト？お前のかわいそうな群れと違って、俺たちはまもなく戦闘に入り、大きな手柄を残す！だがお前は、臆病者は、責任逃れをしたいんだろ！」

languages.text: «¿A quién llamas tú cachorro, Perdido? A diferencia de tu manada de mierda, ¡nosotros en nada iremos a la batalla y saldremos victoriosos! ¡Tú, como eres un cobarde, solo quieres zafarte de tu deber!».
languages.original_text: "Who are you calling a pup, Everlost? Unlike your pathetic pack, we will soon go into battle and accomplish great deeds! But you, coward that you are, want to shirk your duty!"

traits.locale_text: «¿A quién llamas tú cachorro, Perdido? A diferencia de tu manada de mierda, ¡nosotros en nada iremos a la batalla y saldremos victoriosos! ¡Tú, como eres un cobarde, solo quieres zafarte de tu deber!».

languages.text: « Qui traites-tu de louveteau, Égaré ? Contrairement à ta meute pathétique, nous sommes sur le point de partir nous battre pour nous couvrir de gloire ! Mais toi, lâche que tu es, tu tentes de te soustraire à votre devoir ! »
languages.original_text: "Who are you calling a pup, Everlost? Unlike your pathetic pack, we will soon go into battle and accomplish great deeds! But you, coward that you are, want to shirk your duty!"

traits.locale_text: « Qui traites-tu de louveteau, Égaré ? Contrairement à ta meute pathétique, nous sommes sur le point de partir nous battre pour nous couvrir de gloire ! Mais toi, lâche que tu es, tu tentes de te soustraire à votre devoir ! »

languages.text: "Wen nennt Ihr hier einen Welpen, Siegtnie? Im Gegensatz zu Eurem jämmerlichen Rudel ziehen wir bald in die Schlacht und werden Großes vollbringen! Aber Ihr seid ein Feigling und wollt Euch Eurer Pflicht entziehen!"
languages.original_text: "Who are you calling a pup, Everlost? Unlike your pathetic pack, we will soon go into battle and accomplish great deeds! But you, coward that you are, want to shirk your duty!"

traits.locale_text: "Wen nennt Ihr hier einen Welpen, Siegtnie? Im Gegensatz zu Eurem jämmerlichen Rudel ziehen wir bald in die Schlacht und werden Großes vollbringen! Aber Ihr seid ein Feigling und wollt Euch Eurer Pflicht entziehen!"

languages.text: "Sen kime enik diyorsun Hepgaip? Senin acınası sürünün aksine biz yakında savaşa girip büyük görevler başaracağız! Fakat sen, korkak olduğun için görevlerinden kaçıyorsun!"
languages.original_text: "Who are you calling a pup, Everlost? Unlike your pathetic pack, we will soon go into battle and accomplish great deeds! But you, coward that you are, want to shirk your duty!"
